document.full_text: james van riemsdyk scored his first nhl hat-trick to lead the philadelphia flyers to a 4-1 win over the islanders on saturday that ended the new yorkers playoff hopes.
document.title: van riemsdyk hat-trick helps flyers past islanders
lines_and_colors: james van riemsdyk scored his first nhl hat-trick to lead the philadelphia flyers to a 4-1 win over the islanders on saturday that ended the new yorkers playoff hopes.
